## Context.isBound() method

Check if a key is bound in the context or its ancestors

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isBound(key: BindingAddress): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | <code>BindingAddress</code> | Binding key |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
